services.name: Marriage Counselling
services.description: Marriage counselling is a type of therapy that helps couples improve their relationship and resolve conflicts.

services.name: Individual Therapy
services.description: Individual therapy provides a safe space for personal growth and healing through one-on-one sessions with a therapist.

services.name: Relationship Therapy
services.description: Relationship therapy helps individuals and couples build stronger, healthier relationships through therapy and education

services.name: Group Therapy
services.description: Group therapy provides a supportive environment where individuals can share experiences and learn from each other.

services.name: Family Therapy
services.description: Family therapy addresses issues within family dynamics and improves communication among family members.

services.name: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
services.description: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) is a structured, goal-oriented therapy that helps individuals change negative thought patterns.

faqs.question: What is mental therapy, and how can it help me?
faqs.answer: Mental therapy helps you deal with emotional and mental health challenges by working with a licensed therapist.

faqs.question: What if I don't feel a connection with my therapist?
faqs.answer: Itâ€™s okay to try another therapist. Feeling safe and understood is key to good therapy.

faqs.question: What should I expect in my first session?
faqs.answer: You'll talk about your concerns, history, and what you hope to achieve through therapy.

faqs.question: Will therapy be covered by my insurance?
faqs.answer: Most insurance plans cover therapy, but you should check with your provider first.

faqs.question: How long does therapy usually take?
faqs.answer: It varies! Some people go for a few weeks, others for months depending on their needs.
